title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 492 - Climate Smart Community Projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 492 - Climate Smart Community Projects

State Regulations

Subpart 492-1 - Climate Smart Community Projects - Definitions (§ 492-1.1)

Subpart 492-2 - Clean Vehicle Projects (§ 492-2.1 to 492-2.5)

Subpart 492-3 - Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation Projects (§ 492-3.1 to 492-3.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. I, pt. 492

Amended

New

York State Register February 28, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 09, eff. 2/28/2018

Statutory Authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 1-0101, 3-0301, 54-1501, 54-1503, 54-1509, 54-1511, 54-1521

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
